# Magic Circle Against Good (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 3]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF (a 3-ft.-diameter circle of powdered silver)

**Range:** Touch

**Area:** 10-ft.-radius emanation from touched creature

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** No; see text

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 308

This spell functions like *[[Magic Circle Against Evil (Spell)|magic circle against evil]]**,* except that it is similar to *[[Protection From Good (Spell)|protection from good]]* instead of *[[Protection From Evil (Spell)|protection from evil]]*, and it can imprison a nonevil called creature.

**GM Note** 

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 3 to Level per *Dungeon Master's Guide*.
